trans-unit.source: 检测到路径已经存在，路径将不会被添加
trans-unit.target: Detected that the path already exists, the path will not be added
{0} Automatically check for updates when launching the app

trans-unit.source: 是否要清除备份模块的数据？保存于备份文件夹中的数据将不会被清除
trans-unit.target: Do you want to clear the data of the backup module? Data saved in the backup folder will not be erased
Do you want to delete them together?

trans-unit.source: 您正在使用指定文件夹中的数据
trans-unit.target: You are using data from the specified folder

trans-unit.source: 删除的数据不可恢复，确定删除？
trans-unit.target: Deleted data cannot be recovered, are you sure to delete?

trans-unit.source: 您正在尝试删除Reminder的数据
trans-unit.target: You are trying to delete Reminder's data

trans-unit.source: 正在与完整备份进行比对
将选中的备份导出到库中的下载文件夹

trans-unit.source: 从这个文件内导入，还是覆盖这个文件？
trans-unit.target: Import from this file, or overwrite this file?

trans-unit.source: 检测到选定的文件夹内存在数据文件
trans-unit.target: Data files detected in the selected folder

trans-unit.source: 指定文件夹不存在，已被清除
trans-unit.target: The specified folder does not exist and has been cleared

trans-unit.source: 找到数据文件，数据为空，但是找到数据备份。是否使用备份数据恢复？
trans-unit.target: The data file is found, the data is empty, but the data backup is found. Do you want to use the backup data to restore?

trans-unit.source: 目前无数据文件，但是找到数据备份。是否使用备份数据恢复？
trans-unit.target: There is currently no data file, but a data backup has been found. Do you want to use the backup data to restore?

trans-unit.source: 将在1天之内到期，请留意。
trans-unit.target: Will expire within 1 day, please pay attention.
{0} items in total will expire within 1 day.
